content: add a fun vibe to your space with this light-hearted garland made in fresh shades of lily sugar n cream first stitch individual cacti and roses then join them into a garland with a slip_stitch practice single_crochet double_crochet simple shaping and slip stitches to complete your project this pattern is so versatile you can attach a cactus or rose to your jackets bags or even greeting cards **sizing** cactus motifs = approx 4 10 cm tall
